name.fr: Auto PiP pour YouTube™ - Contrôleur vidéo

short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Control YouTube video playback in background tabs
short.ja: バックグラウンドタブでのYouTube動画再生を制御します
short.ko: 백그라운드 탭의 YouTube 동영상 재생을 제어합니다

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Control YouTube video playback in background tabs.

If you change to another tab, the YouTube video will either pause or switch to PiP mode automatically. You can choose!
